parameter.value: In the end, I will only be nice to they who know my name.
I have always wanted one of those blood herbs, and I have a chest in my room. You can have the thing in there if you give me a blood herb...
I have always wanted one of those blood herbs, and I have a chest in my room. You can have the thing in there if you give me a blood herb...
Do you have it!? No! I don't trust you! What is my name then?
